constituent: calm, wheat, cereal, hideaway, claw, vulture, broom, heart
koohiiStory1: The farmer is calm knowing that his wheat fields are protected from vultures by his strawman with a heart (all the better to do the job properly).
koohiiStory2: This whole kanji is a picture of calmness. The wheat has been harvested and even the vultures sit calmly watching the humans sweep and clean-up after the harvest is over. Hearts are peaceful and calm at this time of the year. Even the days are calm without storm.
words: 穏やか(おだやか): calm, gentle, quiet
